summary: A sixteenth century love story about a marriage of alliance that gave birth to true love between a great Mughal emperor, Akbar, and a Rajput princess, Jodha.
cast: Hrithik Roshan|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Sonu Sood|Poonam Sinha|Suhasini Mulay|Ila Arun|Raza Murad|Kulbhushan Kharbanda|Surendra Pal|Rajesh Vivek|Pramod Moutho|V.M. keywords: indian history|reference to allah|reference to mecca|betray|stepmother
title: Jodhaa Akbar
